statements: DELETE FROM driver_behavior_tracking WHERE speed < 50 AND event_type = 'harsh_braking';
DELETE FROM driver_behavior_tracking WHERE event_type = 'harsh_acceleration' AND acceleration > 5.0;
DELETE FROM driver_compliance WHERE drug_test_compliance = false;
DELETE FROM driver_compliance WHERE driver_id = 456 AND drug_test_compliance = TRUE
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 101 AND company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' AND driver_id = 202;
DELETE FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM driver_info WHERE total_miles_driven < 10000);
